pr_title: Remove pre-commit linter from Web UI

timeline.bodyText:
Is there a reason to set
NODE_ENV=production && npm-run-all ...`

vs
NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all ...

I think the ampersand is unnecessary?
timeline.author: ZacBlanco
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -27,17 +27,13 @@
     "start-js": "BROWSER=none react-scripts start --watch --recursive",
     "build-js": "react-scripts build --production",
     "start": "npm-run-all --parallel watch-css start-js",
-    "build": "NODE_ENV=production && npm-run-all --parallel build-css build-js",
+    "build": "eslint 'src/**/*.tsx' && NODE_ENV=production && npm-run-all --parallel build-css build-js",

timeline.message: remove amp, move linter to postbuild
